text: Tagetes microglossa is a Mesoamerican species of marigolds in the sunflower family. It grows in Central America, Colombia, and Ecuador, as well as in central and southern Mexico, from Jalisco to Chiapas.Turner, B. L. 1996. Leaves are pinnately compound with 7-11 leaflets.
